```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(rethinking)
library(tidyverse)
data("Howell1")
d <- Howell1
precis(d)
```

```{r}
d2 <- d[d$age >= 18, ]
precis(d2)
```

```{r}
ggplot(d2, aes(x=height)) +
    geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
curve(dnorm(x, 178, 20), from=100, to=250)
curve(dunif(x, 0, 50), from=-10, to=60)
```

```{r}
prior_mu <- rnorm(1e4, 178, 20)
prior_sigma <- runif(1e4, 0, 25)
prior_h <- rnorm(1e4, mean=prior_mu, sd=prior_sigma)
dens(prior_h)
```

```{r}
flist <- alist(
    height ~ dnorm(mu, sigma),
    mu ~ dnorm(178, 20),
    sigma ~ dunif(0, 25)
)

m41 <- quap(flist, data = d2)

precis(m41)
```

```{r}
par(mfrow=c(1, 2))
samps <- extract.samples(m41, 1e4)
dens(samps$mu)
dens(samps$sigma)
```
```{r}
vcov(m41)
diag(vcov(m41))
cov2cor(vcov(m41))
```

```{r}
plot(d2$height ~ d2$weight)
```

```{r}
a <- rnorm(1e2, 178, 20)
b0 <- rnorm(1e2, 0, 2)
b1 <- rlnorm(1e2, 0, 1)
b2 <- rbeta(1e2, 1, 5)
par(mfrow=c(1, 3))
dens(b0)
dens(b1)
dens(b2)
```

```{r}
plot(NULL, xlim=range(d2$weight), ylim=c(-100, 400), xlab='weight', ylab='height')
abline(h=0)
abline(h=272)
xbar <- mean(d2$weight)
for (i in 1:1e2) {
    curve(a[i] + b1[i] * (x - xbar), from=min(d2$weight), to=max(d2$weight), add = TRUE, col=col.alpha("black", 0.2))
}
```

```{r}
xbar <- mean(d2$weight)

m43 <- quap(
    alist(
        height ~ dnorm(mu, sigma), 
        mu <- a + b * (weight - xbar),
        a ~ dnorm(178, 20),
        b ~ dunif(0, 1),
        sigma ~ dnorm(0, 25)
    ), data=d2, start=list(a=178, b=0.5, sigma=1)
)

precis(m43)
m43 %>% vcov %>% cov2cor %>% round(3)
```

```{r}
plot(d2$height ~ d2$weight)
post <- extract.samples(m43, n=1e4)
curve(mean(post$a) + mean(post$b) * (x - xbar), add=TRUE, col="red")
```
